python_translator.Translator

class python_translator.Translator
translate(text: str, target_language, source_language: str = 'en') → str

Translate text from source language to target language.

Arguments:

text (str) : Text to be translated. target_language (str) : Target language. source_language (str) : Source language.

Returns:

str : Translated text. None : If the translation failed.

translate_text(text: str, target_language, source_language: str = 'en') → str

Translate text from source language to target language.

Arguments:

text (str) : Text to be translated. target_language (str) : Target language. source_language (str) : Source language.

Returns:

str : Translated text. None : If the translation failed.
